initiative.body: Our Community Literacy project works with community facilitators from Yukon communities to design and run unique literacy programs. Facilitators are trained how to design and create their specific programs and learn how to embed literacy and essential skills. This past year, a facilitator from Carcross offered a traditional medicine and planting program, a facilitator from Teslin offered a community carpentry program that made benches for their community, and facilitators from Mayo ran a food security program which provided the local daycare with a garden bed and planting supplies.
initiative.title: Community Literacy Program
initiative.subTitle: Embedding Literacy
